text: The Wright StreetAir is a single-decker electric bus. It has a low-floor. It was made from 2016 to 2017 by Wrightbus. In 2021, the Streetair was replaced with the single-decker Wright GB Kite and the double-deck Wright StreetDeck Electroliner and Wright Hydroliner. == Operators == In October 2017, Lothian Buses ordered six StreetAirs. == References == Category:Low-floor buses Category:Midibuses StreetAir Category:Battery electric buses
title: Wright StreetAir
